Translations.Text: Ni revealed vi this Quran; special revelation el us
Vi steadfastly port your Lord's commandments ne obe any sinful disbeliever them
Kaj commemorate nom your Lord tag kaj nokt
Dum nokt auxtun prostrate antaux Him glor Him many long nokt
These popol preoccupied this fleeting life while disregarding - Just ahead da them - heavy tag
Ni kre them establ them kaj whenever ni testament ni substitute others their met
This est reminder whoever vol choose path al his Lord
Whatever vi do gxi est en accordance kun di testament DI est Omniscient SAGX
Li admits whomever Li vol into His mercy. As por transgressors Li prepar them painful retribution
